author: builder_benny
content: are there any dashboards/resources that show client teams' share of validators on Goerli? (based on today's call seems that these make up a significant portion of validators) - I am not looking for % of valds running a specific client, but rather how many validators (%) are being run by client teams

author: parithosh
content: I think all client teams together would be ~80% of goerli, info could be a bit dated and haven't checked in a while
